definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: IntroductionThe centrosome is the major microtubule organizing center ( MTOC) of mammalian cells.
sentences.chinese: 中心体是哺乳类细胞主要的微管组织中心。

sentences.english: Microtubules have dominated our think about the mitotic mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 微管促使我的思考有丝分裂的机制。

sentences.english: The rod-shaped filaments of the microtubules are responsible for dividing the chromosomes in a cell.
sentences.chinese: 微管杆形丝担负划分细胞中染色体的角色。

sentences.english: Both microtubule and actin cytoskeleton have been shown to be involved in proper nuclear positioning.
sentences.chinese: 细胞骨架微管和肌动蛋白都参与了细胞核定位的过程。

sentences.english: During the rounding process spontaneous contractions stopped and microtubules and myofibrils depolymerized.
sentences.chinese: 在变圆过程中微管及肌原纤维解聚，自发性收缩停止。

sentences.english: Aim To study the effect of 5F on tubulin polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究半边旗提取物5F对微管蛋白聚合的影响。

sentences.english: The microtubule is simplified as linear distribution of dipoles.
sentences.chinese: 把微管的构象简化为若干电偶极子的线性排列。

sentences.english: Microtubules are also used in the construction of centrioles, basal bodies, cilia and flagella.
sentences.chinese: 微管还用于建造中心粒，基体，纤毛和鞭毛。

sentences.english: It blocks tumor cells by stabilizing and polymerizing microtubules.
sentences.chinese: 其作用是使微管稳定和发生多聚化从而抑制瘤细胞。

sentences.english: Microfilaments and microtubules are responsible for almost all major cytoplasmic movements.
sentences.chinese: 绝大部分细胞质运动由微丝和微管完成。

sentences.english: Viral transport occurred in microtubule-dependent, endosomal vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 病毒的转运发生在微管依赖的内体小泡。

sentences.english: Microsfilaments and microtubules are responsible for almost all major cytoplasmic movements.
sentences.chinese: 微丝和微管主要负责大多数细胞质移动。

sentences.english: Cell adhesion forces were measured by means of micropipette aspiration technique.
sentences.chinese: 细胞粘附力采用微管吸吮技术进行测定。

sentences.english: There are a plenty of pores and pore tubules in the cuticle of olfactory sensillum.
sentences.chinese: 嗅感器表皮有微孔和孔道微管。

sentences.english: The actions of microtubule organizing centers and coated vesicles were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了包被囊泡和微管组织中心可能的作用。

sentences.english: This result indicated the elastic property of fluorescence labeled MTs.
sentences.chinese: 此实验直接显示了微管的弹性性质。

pinyin: shen2 jing1 jiao1 zhi4 xi4 bao1
